name: CC0394 - ITP-007 - Electrical Trenching and Blinding
template name: CC0394 - ITP-007 - Electrical Trenching and Blinding REV0

name: Lot Status
values: Awaiting Hold Point Release, Awaiting NCR Closure, Awaiting Test Results, Awaiting Verification, Cancelled, Closed-out, Outstanding, Work In Progress

name: Ensure that the following items have been actioned:
Acceptance criteria - SWMS/WMS submitted reviewed & accepted if required.
○ Service Diagrams available and services located
Have any/all of the above SWMS been reviewed and are available to all staff and signed onto every month?
Acceptance criteria - Site Environnemental Management Plans (SEMP) on site.
Have any/all of the above management plans been acquired and are available for review?
Frequency - Prior to excavation in each location
Ref docs - Worksafe Excavation Permit. Symal Ground Penetration Permit.
Frequency - Prior to start of works
Acceptance criteria - Peg location of proposed underground services with levels from end to end.
Has the above been completed and approved?
Acceptance criteria - Mix design to be approved prior to placement.
○ Material properties meet project specification, AS 3600, AS 1379. 25mPa as per construction drawings.
Acceptance criteria - Lot Size = Each construction stage
2.1 - Excavate to width and depth as per survey pegs
Acceptance criteria - Trench depth nominated tolerance is 0 to -20mm. In reference to the depth of the culvert.
○ Trench Width is as per drawings provided. Typical trench width will be 1.6m.
○ Road Crossing trench width will be 4.5m.
Have the above depths of cover been achieved and approved?
Remarks / record (eg. test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) - Photos of trench width and depth.
Acceptance criteria - Has the 0.2mm damp proof membrane been installed with accordance to the design drawings?
○ The DPM extends up the sides of the blinding on both edges, above the surface of the blinding.
○ Has the DPM been laid and overlapped at 200mm along the length of the culvert trench.
Acceptance criteria - Have Connolly joints been installed at 2500mm spacings. Nominated KJ100.
2.4 - Installation of Formwork and boxing/finished levels

Acceptance criteria - Has formwork or boxing or height pins been installed as per the nominated design tolerance of 0 to -10mm of the design finished level of the blinding. As per the nominal datum of 10m.
○ Note: RJE are to confirm applicable height of Concrete Culvert segments.
Ref docs - Drawing no. 5668-126-1005 Rev 1, Pre-Pour Checklist
Acceptance criteria - Pre-pour inspection undertaken, confirming that all requirements have been met and pour can be completed.
Has all requirements been met, RJE supervision involved in inspection and approval given and considered ready to pour?
Remarks / record (eg. test frequency, reports, certificates, checklist etc) - Pre pour checklist
Acceptance criteria - Steel Trowel non-slip finish nominated.
